casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joe Robert REYNOLDS 155P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Reynolds, Joe Robert. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2017 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review and Petition for Writ of Supersedeas and to Dissolve Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
